title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model; no API keys needed.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI wrapper around the Ollama REST API written in Ruby.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with builders and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate providing typed bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with both synchronous and async APIs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images and compose examples for CPU & GPU runtimes.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Qt6 and Python.

title: ollama-sd-webui
summary: Extension for AUTOMATIC1111 WebUI that adds Ollama-based prompt generation.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers to talk to Ollama.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models in production pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG system with Ollama, Chroma and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama models to Discord servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot bringing private or channel-based access to Ollama LLMs.
